metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19142 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 6.0.x before 6.0.13 allows an admin toconduct an XSS attack via a modified URL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19142` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.13-1
otrs2 - 6.0.13-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.13-1').
